snippet: Many people follow vote counts that ignore the geographic mix of those votes. It doesn’t have to be that way, and The Upshot can help.
abstract: The Upshot offers guide for how to follow election returns that takes into account where votes come from; describes how adjustment to vote tallies would have looked like in contest between Pres Obama and Mitt Romney in Virginia in 2012.

byline.original: By AMANDA COX and NATE COHN

lead_paragraph: Many people follow vote counts that ignore the geographic mix of those votes. It doesn’t have to be that way, and The Upshot can help.

headline.main: How to Watch the Elections Like an Expert
headline.print_headline: How to Watch the Elections Like an Expert
